text_logic_form: The line $TU$ is perpendicular to the line $UV$.
The line $UV$ is perpendicular to the line $VW$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $TU$ is perpendicular to the line $UV$.
The line $UV$ is perpendicular to the line $VW$.
diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $AUV$ is equal to the measure of angle $2$.
The length of the line $VT$ is $5$ units.
The measure of angle $WAV$ is equal to the measure of angle $1$.
The measure of angle $UVA$ is $27$ degrees.
The measure of angle $VWA$ is $72$ degrees.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $V$ and $T$.
Point $A$ also lies on the line connecting $W$ and $U$.
line_instances: There are lines $VW$, $VU$, $VT$, forming a triangle $VUT$.
There are lines $VA$, $WU$, $WA$, forming a triangle $AWU$.
